mil5.3.1:1.2_1: seṭṭho janetasmiṁ diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāye cā’ti.
mil5.3.1:1.3_0: Puna ca ‘upāsako gihī sotāpanno pihitāpāyo diṭṭhippatto viññātasāsano bhikkhuṁ vā sāmaṇeraṁ vā puthujjanaṁ abhivādeti paccuṭṭhetī’ti.
mil5.3.1:1.5_1: seṭṭho janetasmiṁ diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāye cā’ti,
mil5.3.1:1.5_2: tena hi ‘upāsako gihī sotāpanno pihitāpāyo diṭṭhippatto viññātasāsano bhikkhuṁ vā sāmaṇeraṁ vā puthujjanaṁ abhivādeti paccuṭṭhetī’ti yaṁ vacanaṁ, taṁ micchā.
mil5.3.1:1.6_0: Yadi ‘upāsako gihī sotāpanno pihitāpāyo diṭṭhippatto viññātasāsano bhikkhuṁ vā sāmaṇeraṁ vā puthujjanaṁ abhivādeti paccuṭṭheti’, tena hi ‘dhammo hi, vāseṭṭha,
mil5.3.1:1.6_1: seṭṭho janetasmiṁ diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāye cā’ti tampi vacanaṁ micchā.
mil5.3.1:1.7_0: Ayampi ubhato koṭiko pañho tavānuppatto, so tayā nibbāhitabbo”ti.
mil5.3.1:2.1_1: seṭṭho janetasmiṁ diṭṭhe ceva dhamme abhisamparāye cā’ti,
mil5.3.1:2.1_2: ‘upāsako ca gihī sotāpanno pihitāpāyo diṭṭhippatto viññātasāsano bhikkhuṁ vā sāmaṇeraṁ vā puthujjanaṁ abhivādeti paccuṭṭheti’.
mil5.3.1:3.1_1: samaṇassa samaṇakaraṇā dhammā dve ca liṅgāni,
mil5.3.1:3.2_0: Katame vīsati samaṇassa samaṇakaraṇā dhammā dve ca liṅgāni?
mil5.3.1:3.3_1: cāro vihāro saṁyamo saṁvaro khanti soraccaṁ ekattacariyā ekattābhirati paṭisallānaṁ hiriottappaṁ vīriyaṁ appamādo sikkhāsamādānaṁ uddeso paripucchā sīlādiabhirati nirālayatā sikkhāpadapāripūritā, kāsāvadhāraṇaṁ, bhaṇḍubhāvo.
mil5.3.1:3.4_1: vīsati samaṇassa samaṇakaraṇā dhammā dve ca liṅgāni.
mil5.3.1:3.5_1: so tesaṁ dhammānaṁ anūnattā paripuṇṇattā sampannattā samannāgatattā asekkhabhūmiṁ arahantabhūmiṁ okkamati,
mil5.3.1:3.5_3: arahattāsannagatoti arahati upāsako sotāpanno bhikkhuṁ puthujjanaṁ abhivādetuṁ paccuṭṭhātuṁ.
mil5.3.1:4.1_1: natthi me so samayo’ti arahati upāsako sotāpanno bhikkhuṁ puthujjanaṁ abhivādetuṁ paccuṭṭhātuṁ.
mil5.3.1:5.1_1: nāhaṁ taṁ ṭhānaṁ upagato’ti arahati upāsako sotāpanno bhikkhuṁ puthujjanaṁ abhivādetuṁ paccuṭṭhātuṁ.
mil5.3.1:6.1_1: nāhaṁ taṁ labhāmi sotun’ti arahati upāsako sotāpanno bhikkhuṁ puthujjanaṁ abhivādetuṁ paccuṭṭhātuṁ.
mil5.3.1:7.1_1: ahametaṁ na labhāmi kātun’ti arahati upāsako sotāpanno bhikkhuṁ puthujjanaṁ abhivādetuṁ paccuṭṭhātuṁ.
mil5.3.1:8.1_1: nāhaṁ tesu vattāmī’ti arahati upāsako sotāpanno bhikkhuṁ puthujjanaṁ abhivādetuṁ paccuṭṭhātuṁ.
mil5.3.1:9.1_1: tenāhaṁ liṅgena dūramapagato’ti arahati upāsako sotāpanno bhikkhuṁ puthujjanaṁ abhivādetuṁ paccuṭṭhātuṁ.
mil5.3.1:10.1_1: ahaṁ pana maṇḍanavibhūsanābhirato’ti arahati upāsako sotāpanno bhikkhuṁ puthujjanaṁ abhivādetuṁ paccuṭṭhātuṁ.
mil5.3.1:11.1_1: ‘ye te vīsati samaṇakaraṇā dhammā dve ca liṅgāni,
mil5.3.1:11.1_2: sabbepete dhammā bhikkhussa saṁvijjanti, soyeva te dhamme dhāreti, aññepi tattha sikkhāpeti,
mil5.3.1:11.1_3: so me āgamo sikkhāpanañca natthī’ti arahati upāsako sotāpanno bhikkhuṁ puthujjanaṁ abhivādetuṁ paccuṭṭhātuṁ.
mil5.3.1:12.1_1: rājakumāro purohitassa santike vijjaṁ adhīyati, khattiyadhammaṁ sikkhati,
mil5.3.1:12.1_2: so aparena samayena abhisitto ācariyaṁ abhivādeti paccuṭṭheti ‘sikkhāpako me ayan’ti;
mil5.3.1:12.2_1: ‘bhikkhu sikkhāpako vaṁsadharo’ti arahati upāsako sotāpanno bhikkhuṁ puthujjanaṁ abhivādetuṁ paccuṭṭhātuṁ.
mil5.3.1:13.1_1: imināpetaṁ pariyāyena jānāhi bhikkhubhūmiyā mahantataṁ asamavipulabhāvaṁ.
mil5.3.1:13.2_2: dveva tassa gatiyo bhavanti anaññā tasmiṁyeva divase parinibbāyeyya vā,
mil5.3.1:13.3_0: Acalā hi sā, mahārāja, pabbajjā, mahatī accuggatā, yadidaṁ bhikkhubhūmī”ti.
mil5.3.1:13.4_2: na yimaṁ pañhaṁ samattho añño evaṁ viniveṭhetuṁ aññatra tavādisena buddhimatā”ti.
